bike.description: New 2013 Frame Design, Pat Laughlin Signature Model, 100% Cr-Mo, Double-Butted Main Frame, Integrated Seat Clamp, Integrated Head Tube, Externally Machined Mid-BB, Removable Cable Guides & Brake Mounts

components.description: Full Cr-Mo, Tapered Legs, 3/8" Dropouts w/ 32mm Offset
3-pc Cr-Mo, 175mm, Closed-end Invisibolt, Mid-Sealed Bearing, 25T Alloy Bubble Sprocket
SE Alloy 36H 3/8" Female F & 14mm Female Semi-Sealed R Hubs w/ Alex Supra BH Front & DM22 Rear Double-Wall Rims, 9T Driver
Lightweight Tioga Street Block, 20 x 2.25" F & R
SE Top-Load Alloy, Lightweight External Cutouts, Hidden Top Cap
Big Daddy Jackhammer Grip w/ Rubber SE End Plugs
Lightweight SE Seat/Post Combo w/ Padding
